dialog.exportWalletsWarning.message:
Klarity Flight is about to import wallets from the production version of Klarity.

The production version of Klarity must not be running during the import process. If you have not already done so, please close the production Klarity application now.
dialog.exportWalletsWarning.title: Import wallets
menu.helpSupport.blankScreenFixDialogMes:
Turn off 'Blank screen fix'? 
 
Disabling the blank screen fix setting will improve the performance of user interface rendering by enabling graphics acceleration, however, some users may find that Klarity runs better with this setting enabled. If you see a blank screen instead of the Klarity user interface after disabling this setting and restarting Klarity, please turn this setting back on. 
 
Do you want to disable this setting and restart Klarity?
menu.helpSupport.nonBlankScreenFixDialog:
Turn on 'Blank screen fix'? 
 
If the Klarity user interface is failing to load then enabling this setting may fix the problem. It will reduce the performance of user interface rendering by disabling graphics acceleration, but some users may find that Klarity runs better with this setting enabled. 
 
Enable this setting only if the Klarity user interface is failing to load. If Klarity is working properly, please click ‘Cancel’. Otherwise, click ‘Yes’ to restart Klarity with the blank screen fix setting enabled. 
 
Do you want to enable this setting and restart Klarity?
